data.name: Adventure of Rikka - The Cursed Kingdom
data.detailed_description:
The kingdom of Delheed had been a peaceful land for a hundred years, lush forests, roaring mountains and pristine beaches.

One day there was a storm, no villager had ever seen a storm before, they all huddled inside their homes in shear confusion. After the storm had passed the lands were no longer what they used to be... The volcano on the mountain erupted, certain parts were cast in darkness, and the water in the old forest had been turned toxic! There were strange beasts and monsters roaming the outdoors and because of the 100 year peace, no one was ready for this.

The kingdom had not always been a peaceful place, over a hundred years ago there was a forgotten event that took place to thwart the darkness and bring in prosperity and peace. The king called all willing to stand up for their kingdom to once again banish the curse which laid upon the land.

This is where your story begins, you've been reclusively living in the forest as a lumberjack your entire life, you're adventure starts now, Rikka...


The Adventure of Rikka is a top down 2d action RPG with a focus on puzzles and exploring.

These are some of the key elements of the game
  • 7 Dungeons with bosses and many smaller puzzle dungeons
  • 12 Unique player items such as the Bow, Bomb and Decoy wand
  • Upgradeable items and weapons
  • Shards and Stones of Power to collect to upgrade your player stats
  • A plethora of side quests
